AzureBlade: Of course I do! 

His tone raised clearly and his temper reached a summit. How could a
Predacon leader be so stupid?

AzureBlade: You are currently playing the ostrich and trying not to
see the obvious. Continue with that agenda and you'll be dead in just
a few megacycles. You can not destroy the maximals and gain anything
because THEY HAVE NOTHING LEFT! The Tripredacus have utterly conquered
Cybertron and as we speak, they are securing the colonies they have
just invaded. Compared to them, you are a puny insect! Don't you
understand that if you wear yourself down against the Maximals, you'll
be swallowed by the greater threat?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras:
> 
> "Do you have somethign to add????"replied the Predacon boss
